extendedInfo.description: This fun new app features a whole bunch of weed party games to give you entertainment while you are getting stoned on your good stash of marijuana. There are games for both someone flying solo and for the group of friends. **Note these are not actual video games. These are party games for anywhere from 1 to many players to give you an activity to do to get high**Backgrounds that allow you to trip out while you play the games.Games such as:*Stoner Says: Game similar to simon says, but you can guess what the outcome of this game is.*Kings Joint: Ever played Kings Cup? Well this game is similar, but gets you high rather than drunk.*Trippy: Simply a way to trip out while you are taking hits. Stare closely!**Within the app the games with red names are not currently available to the free version. Upgrade for only 99 cents to unlock them and receive a lot more games soon.**Currently this version features 7 games. And more are coming with future updates. These current games will also be modified to add content and make them even more fun.If you have any ideas or tasks/objectives that you think would be a great addition to these games feel free to shoot me an email at FALLACYSTUDIOS@GMAIL.COMIf you experience any problems at all or are not liking the app please send me an email rather than give bad ratings. I will do my best to resolve any issues.The permissions used are for putting up the ads only.Happy Toking!Special Thanks to http://trippypsychart.blogspot.com/ for the public domain background art.TAGS: smoke, weed, bud, marijuana, stoner, stoners, handbook, toke, high, blunt, joint, trip, trippy, fun, game, games, party, baked(c)2011 All Rights Reserved. Fallacy Studios
